scripts.backup: node -e "const BackupService = require('./services/backupService'); const bs = new BackupService(); bs.createBackup().then(() => process.exit(0)).catch(e => { console.error(e); process.exit(1); });"
scripts.backup:daily: node -e "const BackupService = require('./services/backupService'); const bs = new BackupService(); bs.createDailyBackup().then(() => process.exit(0)).catch(e => { console.error(e); process.exit(1); });"
scripts.backup:list: node -e "const BackupService = require('./services/backupService'); const bs = new BackupService(); bs.listBackups().then(() => process.exit(0)).catch(e => { console.error(e); process.exit(1); });"
scripts.backup:restore: node -e "const BackupService = require('./services/backupService'); const filename = process.argv[2]; if (!filename) { console.error('Usage: npm run backup:restore <filename>'); process.exit(1); } const bs = new BackupService(); bs.restoreBackup(filename).then(() => process.exit(0)).catch(e => { console.error(e); process.exit(1); });"
